name: tabtogether
description: Send tabs to multiple devices simultaneously.
author: ophilar

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs background.js -o background.min.js && uglifyjs utils.js -o utils.min.js && uglifyjs popup.js -o popup.min.js && uglifyjs options.js -o options.min.js && uglifyjs shared-ui.js -o shared-ui.min.js && uglifyjs theme.js -o theme.min.js && uglifyjs constants.js -o constants.min.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o styles.min.css styles.css && cleancss -o popup.min.css popup.css && cleancss -o options.min.css options.css && cleancss -o popup-Storos.min.css popup-Storos.css
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o popup.min.html popup.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true -o options.min.html options.html
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.package: npm run build && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath TabTogether.zip
